    • getAppExternalDirLocked

      public File getAppExternalDirLocked(String appPkg)
      Obtain an external relative (not absolutely path) path by package name Mostly be like /storage/emulated/0/Android/obb/[Your Package Name]/scopedStorage/[appPkg]
      Parameters:
      appPkg - package name
      Returns:
      A relative path, please do not hardcode the external path.
